etymons.meaning: frapper, porter un coup avec sabre

Infectum - wa.turoyo: Kǝmminanne ʕaynǝnto w annaqqa ḥurkiwaynanne bu ḥurako… 2018_07_08_au_003_NE_1F
translations: We called them (those herbs) ʕaynǝnto and we crashed them (herbs) with the ḥurako stone,

tokens.value: Kǝmminanne ʕaynǝnto w annaqqa ḥurkiwaynanne bu ḥurako
‘ We called them (those herbs) ʕaynǝnto and we crashed them (herbs) with the ḥurako stone,’

Infectum - wa.text: Kǝmminanne ʕaynǝnto w annaqqa ḥurkiwaynanne bu ḥurako,… ‘ We called them (those herbs) ʕaynǝnto and we crashed them (herbs) with the ḥurako stone,’ 2018_07_08_au_003_NE_1F; 16:14

idioms: mit dem ḥūrko genannten Stein zerreiben (z.B. das pəḏre genannte Kraut);
